title: Display configured M-Pesa destination number in wallet deposit instructions

requirements.summary: Fetch the configured M-Pesa destination number from the backend and show it in the Wallet deposit M-Pesa instructions (manual review flow, English text).
acceptanceCriteria: On the Wallet deposit form when M-Pesa is selected, the instructions explicitly show the destination number "0701599601" as the number users should send funds to.
The destination number displayed in the instructions is fetched from the backend (not hardcoded in the component).
All user-facing instruction text is in English and continues to state that deposits are manually reviewed/approved.

file_operations.description: Add a React Query hook (e.g., useGetMpesaNumber) that reads the configured destination number via the existing backend actor method getMpesaNumber(), with actor/isFetching gating consistent with other wallet queries.

Update the deposit instructions UI to call the new useGetMpesaNumber hook and render the fetched M-Pesa destination number in clear English (no M-Pesa API integration), while keeping the existing manual-review messaging; include loading/error-safe copy that still avoids hardcoding the number.
